General.Name: Chiangmai Rimdoi Public Company Limited
General.Description: Chiangmai Rimdoi Public Company Limited engages in the construction and solid waste disposal services business in Thailand. It undertakes construction of factory, infrastructure system, inventory buildings, hotels, resorts, hospitals, condominiums, wastewater treatment and plumbing systems, electrical systems, hydroelectricity projects, and other civil works. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Chiang Mai, Thailand.
